subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Carolina Hurricanes goalie Cam Ward remained in a Columbus, Ohio, hospital after his leg was cut by a skate in a 3-2 loss to the Blue Jackets on Saturday.
snippet: Carolina Hurricanes goalie Cam Ward remained in a Columbus, Ohio, hospital after his leg was cut by a skate in a 3-2 loss to the Blue Jackets on Saturday.
